code: import{FETCH_SMSCONFIG,FETCH_SMSCONFIG_SUCCESS,FETCH_SMSCONFIG_FAILED,EDIT_SMSCONFIG}from"../store/types";import{firebase}from'../config/configureFirebase';import{onValue,set}from"firebase/database";export const fetchSMSConfig=()=>dispatch=>{const{smsRef}=firebase;dispatch({type:FETCH_SMSCONFIG,payload:null});onValue(smsRef,snapshot=>{if(snapshot.val()){dispatch({type:FETCH_SMSCONFIG_SUCCESS,payload:snapshot.val()});}else{dispatch({type:FETCH_SMSCONFIG_FAILED,payload:"Unable to fetch SMS Config details."});}});};export const editSmsConfig=smsDetails=>dispatch=>{const{smsRef}=firebase;1;dispatch({type:EDIT_SMSCONFIG,payload:null});set(smsRef,smsDetails);};
